1517750.name: RPG Maker MV - Krachware User Interface Material CYBER
1517750.description:
Welcome to the new visual designs from Gee Kun Soft, the Krachware User Interface Material – Cyber pack featuring a technological and sci-fi inspired pack complete with buttons, menu items, titles, game over screens and more.

The Krachware User Interface Material – Cyber pack provides a great mix of bright and neon colors, along with greyer and blue options to nicely enhance your menus in your next RPG creation. With nearly 400 items in total, these vivid and sleek designs will provide your menus with the options you seek to blend perfectly into your new cyber-futuristic world.

Features:

* titles folders: 48 window frames + 8 titles with at least 5 variations each
* system folder: 60 windowskins + "Game Over" x 11, "Loading" x 5
* bonus folder: 10 buttons with at least 10 color variations each, plus over 130 materials such as arrow icons and decorative graphics!

**Please note that you need the editing software to work with some of the material in "bonus" folder for RPG Makers**

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1517750.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语, 韩语, 繁体中文, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文
